entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:22PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Very Hot Weekend Over The Eastern Interior... ...High Water On The Tanana River Into Next Week... The Eastern Interior will become warmer and drier over the weekend with isolated afternoon thunderstorms. Temperatures will rise into the 80s over most of the Eastern Interior on Saturday, and into the 80s and low 90s on Sunday and Monday.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:19AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, northeastern Limestone and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ardmore, or 13 miles south of Pulaski, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph.
